servinfo.title: DTC P0571: Brake Light Switch Circuit

item.ptxt: This fault may appear if the wiring harness has been damaged.
Follow the procedure described in Electrical Circuit Inspection Procedure .
This check enables the condition and the conformity of the engine wiring harness to be checked.
Conditions for applying fault finding procedures to stored faults:
The fault is declared present after the brake pedal is depressed, or during a road test.
If the fault is present, the cruise control/speed limiter is deactivated.
Use service wire for all operations on the ECM connectors.

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: For wiring circuit and connector number, refer to A-5 Engine and A/C Control System Circuit Diagram (DSL) .

servinfosub.title: Troubleshooting for D1: Open circuit or short circuit

entry.ptxt: Check the connections of the brake lamp switch.
Check the condition and adjustment of the brake lamp switch.
Check the conformity of the brake lamp switch:

item.ptxt: Continuity between “E67-1” and “E67-2” terminals of brake lamp switch.
Infinite resistance across “E67-3” and “E67-4” terminals of brake lamp switch.
Infinite resistance across “E67-1” and “E67-2” terminals of brake lamp switch.
Continuity between “E67-3” and “E67-4” terminals of brake lamp switch.

entry.ptxt: Check the condition of “STOP” fuse on the junction block assembly.
Check the feeds to the switch:

item.ptxt: Between “E67-2” wire of the brake lamp switch connector and “E82-20” terminal of BCM connector
Between “E67-4” wire of the brake lamp switch connector and “E33-6” wire of main relay mounting connector

entry.ptxt: Check the continuity and insulation of the following connections:

item.ptxt: Between “E67-1” wire of brake lamp switch connector and “E66-28” terminal of ECM connector

servinfosub.title: Troubleshooting for D2: Inconsistency of signal

entry.ptxt: Check the connections of the brake lamp switch.
Check the condition and adjustment of the brake lamp switch.
Check the continuity and make sure there is no interference resistance on the following connection:

item.ptxt: Between “E67-1” wire of brake lamp switch connector and “E66-28” terminal of ECM connector

entry.ptxt: If the fault is still present, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
